c1.name: Excellent Blood
c1.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Never-Ending Performance
c2.effect: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an enemy during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c3.name: Dance of Frost
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Kiss
c4.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%: Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency. Can only occur once every 60s.

c5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c6.effect: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
